```{r}
#Created some list
some_list <- c(23, 43, 12)
names(some_list) <- c('age', 'year', 'something')
print(some_list)

#according r documentation
lst <- list(name='Fred', wife='Mary', no.children=3, child.ages=c(4,7,9))
print(lst)
print(length(lst))
#print some component of list
print(lst$child.ages)
print(lst[['name']])
print(lst$name)
print(
  lst$name == lst[['name']]  #An equivalent statement
)
```
